mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comment WHERE blog_id = #{blogId} ORDER BY create_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (blog_id, user_id, content, parent_id, like_count, create_time) VALUES (#{blogId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{parentId}, #{likeCount}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
